references.paper_title: Structured denoising diffusion models in discrete state-spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of discrete diffusion models, a key concept that the current research builds upon.
This paper introduces the MaskGIT model, which is the foundation of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper highlights the superior performance of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, providing context for why MGMs are explored as an alternative.
This paper introduces the fundamental concepts of diffusion models, which are crucial to understanding the underlying framework used in the current research.

references.paper_title: Improved masked image generation with token-critic
references.reason: This paper proposes a method to improve the sampling quality of MGMs, which is directly related to the goal of improving MGMs in the current research.
